name: Subsolul lui Nuca
description:
Acest joc a fost facut ca o gluma desi a ajuns un joc destul de smecher asa ca de ce nu. Nu prea mai am ce sa zic, este un joc cu mai multe ending-uri deci luati-le pe toate :) De asemenea jocul este in Romana si nu il poti pune pe Engleza deci mda..

(This game was made as a joke although it turned out to be a pretty cool game so why not. I don't have much more to say, it's a game with several endings, so go take them all :) Also, the game is in Romanian and you can't set the language to English, so yes..)

HAVE FUN!
